Edit.Name: prpRoutePlannerMode
Edit.Caption: Route mode
Edit.Help: If set to "None", neither airspace or terrain is used for route planning. If set to "Terrain", routes will avoid terrain; if set to "Airspace", routes will avoid airspace. If set to "Both", routes will avoid airspace and terrain.

Edit.Name: prpRoutePlannerAllowClimb
Edit.Caption: Route climb
Edit.Help: When enabled and MC is positive, route planning allows climbs between the aircraft location and destination.

Edit.Name: prpRoutePlannerUseCeiling
Edit.Caption: Route ceiling
Edit.Help: When enabled, route planning climbs are limited to ceiling defined by greater of current aircraft altitude plus 500 m and the thermal ceiling. If disabled, climbs are unlimited.

Edit.Name: prpTurningReach
Edit.Caption: Reach mode
Edit.Help: How calculations are performed of the reach of the glider with respect to terrain. [Off] Reach calculations disabled. [Straight] The reach is from straight line paths from the glider. [Turning] The reach is calculated allowing turns around terrain obstacles.

Edit.Name: prpFinalGlideTerrain
Edit.Caption: Reach display
Edit.Help: This determines whether the glide reach is drawn as a line on the map area: [Off] Disables display [Line] Draws a dashed line at the glide reach [Shade] Shades terrain outside glide reach

Edit.Name: prpReachPolarMode
Edit.Caption: Reach polar
Edit.Help: This determines the glide performance used in reach, landable arrival, abort and alternate calculations: [Task] Uses task glide polar [Safety MC] Uses safety MacCready value
